SEQUENCE.NAME: %category%==/^$/
SEQUENCE.COMMENT: --Used to check if input is null--

Values.value: Category should not be null. Please try again.

SEQUENCE.NAME: %category%==/^[a-z\s]+$/
SEQUENCE.COMMENT: --Used to check if input is correct--

SEQUENCE.NAME: %recordCount%==0
SEQUENCE.COMMENT: --Used to check if count is zero--

Values.value: The selected product category is currently unavailable.

SEQUENCE.NAME: %recordCount%>0
SEQUENCE.COMMENT: --Used to check if count is greater than zero--

SEQUENCE.NAME: $default
SEQUENCE.COMMENT: --Used to check if input is wrong--
